name: Stickman Warriors: 3v3 Brawl
description:
You will find it so much fun to experience this simple but interesting gameplay. All you need to do is dodge, jump, power your chakra, perform basic and 3 advanced skills, transform your hero into an ultra instinct then fight against invaders. The control is so simple that you will be amazed at how attracting the sound effects and graphics are.

FEATURE
- Fight in 3v3 battles
- Easy and Simple to play.
- A lot of superheroes for you to choose
- Stickman Warriors : 3v3 Brawl has the most basic control ever!
- Ultra instinct characters.
